data.title: News
data.text:
Center for Research in Open Source Software welcomes James Davis as new faculty director

Prof James Davis appointed new faculty director

UC OSPO / OSRE Accepted as GSoC Mentor Org

The UCSC OSPO and its Open Source Research Experience was once again accepted as a mentor organization for the Google Summer of Code

CROSS, Skyhook, and Polyphy: Institutional support for creating Paths to Open Source Ecosystems for Open Source Products in Research

April 27 event on institutional support for creating Paths to Open Source Ecosystems for Open Source Products in Research.

UC OSPO / OSRE Accepted as GSoC Mentor Org

The UCSC OSPO and its Open Source Research Experience was once again accepted as a mentor organization for the Google Summer of Code

OSRE Students Contributors Posters and Final Reports

NSF will fund design of a support infrastructure for CROSS incubator project

CROSS PIs were awarded a grant under the NSF/TIP Pathways to Enable Open Source Ecosystems (POSE) program and will explore support infrastructures for Skyhook Data Management, a graduated CROSS incubator project.

NSF award will support project to promote reproducibility in computer science

As part of a grant from he National Science Foundation (NSF), CROSS will participate in collaborative research to increase the reproducibility of computer science research.

CAVSAT Team's Paper Wins Award at ICDE 22

CROSS CAVSAT Project Team wins Best Paper Honorable Mention at the ICDE 2022 conference

17 OSRE Students Contributing to UC-Based OS Projects

UC Mentors will work with record number of OSRE Students, including 14 GSoC contributors, in Summer 2022

Sloan Foundation funds two-year pilot open source program office at UC Santa Cruz

The Alfred P. Sloan Foundation awarded a $695,000 two-year grant aimed at establishing an open source program office (OSPO) that will serve the entire campus community.

CROSS /OSRE selected as GSoC mentor organization for 2022

CROSS was selected to be a GSoC mentor organization for 2022

Skyhook: Bringing Computation to Storage with Apache Arrow

This article takes a closer look at the inclusion of Skyhook into Apache Arrow.

CROSS Awards Best Use of Open Source to CruzHacks'22 Team

A team at UC Santa Cruz was awarded a CROSS sponsored prize for best use of open source at CruzHacks'22

CROSS Incubator SkyhookDM Now Part of Apache Arrow

On October 22, 2021, three reviewers formally approved the merge of the CROSS project SkyhoodDM into the Apache Arrow mainline. SkyhookDM will be part of the Arrow 7.0.0 release.

Great Results from the 2021 Open Source Research Experience

Reports from the some of the students that CROSS mentors supported this year.

Students Working on OSAVC Project Awarded inaugural Fellowship for Anti-Racism Research

Carlos Isaac Espinosa Ramirez, a PhD student working on the CROSS funded Open Source Autonomous Vehicle Controller Project, was awarded one of the first Baskin School of Engineering Fellowship for Anti-Racism Research (FARR).

CROSS Joins TODO Group

CROSS officially joins the TODO Group, an industry group for organizations committed to open source.

Eusocial Project Highlighted by The Next Platform

Eusocial project team publication highlighted and summarized by web publication The Next Platform

CROSS GSoC Students for Summer 2021 Announced

CROSS is happy to announce the five students we are mentoring for the Google Summer of Code 2021 Program

Open Source Influencer Nithya Ruff Joins CROSS Advisory Committee

CROSS welcomes open source expert Nithya Ruff to our Advisory Committee

Open Source Research Experience (OSRE) Program Summer 2021 - application deadline extended to May 10

CROSS selected as GSoC mentor organization for 2021

CROSS was selected to be a GSoC mentor organization for 2021

The CROSS Incubator: A Case Study for funding and training RSEs

CROSS Presents Paper at RSE-HPC 2020: Research Software Engineers in HPC - Creating Community, Building Careers, Addressing Challenges, co-located with SC20, Virtual, November 12, 2020

CROSS Incubator Supporting Casual Creators Graduates

How Can an A.I. Develop Taste? - Article by Kate Compton in Slate

CROSS Incubator Fellow Dr. Kate Compton's has article published in Slate is in response to Holli Mintzer’s “Legal Salvage.”

CROSS Featured in Article: "The Value of Open Source to Universities: UC Santa Cruz Tests the Water"

The Linux Professional Institute Blog posts interview with CROSS Founding Director Carlos Maltzahn entitled "The Value of Open Source to Universities: UC Santa Cruz Tests the Water"

The Open Source Research Experience

A market for open source summer projects.

CROSS Director Interviewed by Sustain Podcast

Carlos Maltzahn talks on the Sustain podcast about Ceph and CROSS, as well as highlighting the work of our incubators.

CROSS Funds Project on Open Source Autonomous Vehicles

CROSS to fund new project on open source autonomous vehicle platforms, further widening scope of topics

CROSS Affiliated Professor Jose Renau receives Google Faculty Research Award

Professor Jose Renau receives Google Faculty Research Award

CROSS Participation in GSoC 2019

CROSS GSoC 2019 students successfully complete four projects

Fujitsu Laboratories Joins CROSS

Fujitsu Laboratories becomes CROSS's newest members

Kate Compton Featured on Embedded FM Podcast

Carlos Maltzahn Featured on Embedded FM Podcast

P-RECS 2019: Workshop on Practical Reproducible Evaluation of Computer Systems

CROSS Incubator Fellow Kate Compton Successfully Defends PhD

CROSS Researcher Ivo Jimenez Successfully Defends PhD Thesis

CROSS congratulates Ivo Jimenez on successfully completing his PhD

CROSS joins new Ceph Foundation to Advance Open Source Storage

Samsung Joins CROSS

Samsung becomes newest members

CROSS Eusocial Storage Device Efforts featured in USENIX ;login: Article

CROSS Advisor Karen Sandler Wins the Prestigious Free Software Award

CROSS Researcher wins Better Scientific Software Fellowship

CROSS selected as GSoC 2018 Mentor Organization

CROSS’s “Eusocial Storage Devices” presented at USENIX FAST’18

CROSS Affiliate John Gustafson Speaks at UCSC Computer Science Department’s Distinguished Lecturer Series

Western Digital Joins CROSS

Ceph Programmability in EuroSys 2017
